Note : Charges will be applied as per the fabric and receipt will be given at the time of pickup
1. collect your clothes within 15 days
2. The company will not be responsible for old or new clothes torn during the process
3. Quality of texture deterioration of fabric color trimings buttons and stains etc. entierly at owners risk
4. The company will not be responsible for clothes if delivery is not taken within one month
5. In case clothes are lost half value will be paid after a months period
6. Saree cleaning at owner risk
7. Subject to Mumbai Jurisdiction

We are assure you best services of products and excellent technical support for any of your needs and optimum satisfactory services.

our vision and focus to provide customized solutions with quality and cost effective product range. A strong customer focus approach and constant quest for top class quality and services have enabled us to attain and sustain leadership position.
We ensure that you always have more to choose from Lux Laundry provide cash,cheque facillities.you can pay money for your services by cheque
We hire only the most qualified professionals to ensure high quality services, such that your satisfaction levels are always at a 100%.

we view protectionof your privacy as a very important principle.We understand clearly that you and your personal information is one of our most important asset.Please review how we use and store your personal information here
Q. Do I need to separate clothes of laundry from dry clean?
Ans: Our pick up riders have reusable laundry bags and you just need to tell our rider suitably about the segregation and our pick up rider will putyour clothes in different bags
Q. How to schedule my first pick-up?
Ans: Scheduling your pick-up is merely a few click away on our App.You can also call on 9811121211 to schedule a pick-up.you can download the Lux-Laundry android app from play store
Q. Are there things that you will not wash?
Ans: NOT Much ! if our laundry specialist discover that it would not be sensible to wash a certain textile we will contact you and agree on how to continue.
Q. What is order size?
Ans: Our minimum order value is Rs.200
Q. Do I need to tip the Delivery Rider?
Ans: No need to search your pockets for that extra bit, We motivate our boys with ample incentives!
